definition: flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]

sentences.english: When summer arrives, she becomes boats in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 一到夏天，她就有如大海里的扁舟。

sentences.english: At that time, always believe that Ma Yueqian will not be distributed knowledge, get boat.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，始终相信马跃千里终有识，不可披发弄扁舟。

sentences.english: Dad persuaded the captain of a pien-tzu to take them down the Han River to Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸说服一条“扁舟”的船老大带他们顺汉江去汉口。

sentences.english: I saw a boat on a twilit river.
sentences.chinese: 我看见薄暮的江上有一叶扁舟。

sentences.english: In a canoe, he crossed the stream, which was recently stocked with fish.
sentences.chinese: 乘一叶扁舟，他驶过一条最近鱼儿常出没的小溪。

sentences.english: A life without their satisfaction, get boat Ming distributed.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世不称意，明朝散发弄扁舟。

sentences.english: "No wind and tide compiled with the prince with" boat together.
sentences.chinese: “潮落江平未有风，扁舟共济与君同”。

sentences.english: Free as a skiff before the dancing wind.
sentences.chinese: 在迅疾的风中，自由如一叶扁舟。

definition: lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
to set sail/to brave the waves
variant of 飄盪|飘荡[piao1 dang4]
to scull (with a single oar, usually mounted on the stern of the boat)
